overview: 2030 A.D., a deadly infectious disease with a fatality rate of 99% called Morumoru, is a virus that can only infect men. The only preventative measure is maternal breast milk. Sang Gyu and Jeon Seo try to get pregnant but both couples find it hard to conceive. They change their partners to find that the chances of pregnancy become high.
title: Her Breast Milk Vaccine
